about_the_game:
The Left Behind is a solo and co-op post-apocalyptic survival game. Explore a typical Dutch open-world landscape at daytime and beware of hordes of enemies coming in at night. Loot and hunt to survive. Each night, the game becomes increasingly challenging. Keep track of your highscore and try to survive as many nights as possible.

The world

Explore typical Dutch landscapes in a post apocalyptic setting. Every building you encounter can be entered and looted. Discover the personality of each building, the world and the people that used to live in it.

Objectives

Survive with up to four (4) people as long as you can in this harsh world. Survive together or take on each other to see who survives the longest? It’s up to you to decide! Loot abandoned buildings at daylight and try to survive enemies coming in at night. Keep an eye out for your food, thirst and health bar at all times. Stack up some food while you can, you never know when you need it…

Features

- Shoot, loot and survive your way through this open world.

- Unlock new areas and weapons while playing the game.

- Encounter various enemies and animals in the world.

- Explore an unique and handcrafted Dutch landscape.

- Play for a new highscore every game, alone or with friends.

- Unlock various melee and ranged weapons.

- Play solo or online with up to 4 friends.

- Save and load your progress.

How many nights can you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended or expect longer than average load times.
